data.title: Daniel Thwaites PLC (THW.AQ) Company Profile & Facts
data.meta_description: See the company profile for Daniel Thwaites PLC (THW.AQ) including business summary, industry/sector information, number of employees, business summary, corporate governance, key executives and their compensation.
data.text:
Description

Daniel Thwaites PLC, together with its subsidiaries, owns, operates, and manages pubs, inns, and hotels and spas in the United Kingdom. It operates Aztec Hotel & Spa, Cottons Hotel & Spa, Kettering Park Hotel & Spa, Langdale Chase, Lodge At Bristol, Lodge At Solent, Middletons Hotel, North Lakes Hotel & Spa, Solent Hotel & Spa, Thorpe Park Hotel & Spa, Crown Inn, The Beverley Arms, The Bulls Head, The Fleece, The Golden Lion, The Judges Lodging, The Lister Arms, The Millstone, The Pendle Inn, The Red Lion, The Royal, The Royal Oak, The Toll House Inn, and THWAITES pub. The company also operates a THWAITES, a craft brewery. Daniel Thwaites PLC was founded in 1807 and is headquartered in Blackburn, the United Kingdom.
